attributes.action: Force Kingston Communications to open up the telecommunications market in Hull and the surrounding area to competitors so the people of Hull can choose their service provider.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of Hull and the surrounding area have no choice when it comes to telecommunications provider. We are forced to become customers of Kingston Communications if we require a land line telephone or an internet connection. We are unable to take advantage of competitive deals and offers provided by other companies, such as free broadband connections from Sky. We resent being subject to such a monopoly. We demand the right to choose.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
